page.title: 19Horses
page.content: We have stables to put the horses in in winter. Our stables are made out of wood, we put straw in them for the horses to lie on.Horses have metal shoes nailed to their feet. The blacksmith puts on the horse's shoes. When we take our horses to shows we always make them look nice.We put some dark oil on their hooves to make them shine. Every month we go to the vets and get a kind of medicine called Wormer. This is a medicine that comes in a long tube You put the tube in the horses mouth and press the bottom, you have to hold the horses chin and hold their head up to get them to swallow the medicine. Worms are long red things that horses get if they eat too much grass. When you give them the medicine the worms come out in their droppings.
